item.title: blogs smogs.
item.description: hiromi got a blog. heh. i hooked her up. hopefully she will use it. UNLIKE MATISS. heh. anyway. yea. the new ruby on rails (i.e. raspberry) ituners.com is almost done. i am excited. it is pretty sweet.
